servinfo.title: Transfer (If Equipped) and Differential Oil Change
servinfo.ptxt: Change transfer oil and differential oil (front and rear) with new specified oil respectively.
For transfer, refer to Transfer Oil Change:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) or Transfer Oil Change:Non-Shift Type (Transfer without Shift Actuator) .
For front differential, refer to Front Differential Oil Change:Front .
For rear differential, refer to Rear Differential Oil Change:Rear .
